website_summaries.verdict: A beautifully bright, but soft, lighting addition to any kitchen cabinet.
pros: Everything is included in the box
Chose between installing the lights with clips and screws, or double sided adhesive strips
Extension cords are also included for further customization
Wire ties make concealing the wires easy
The highlight of the Litever LED's is the dimmer switch – an excellent way to add a little mood lighting
Color of these lights is bright but not harsh
cons: Sits at a higher price point than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and amazing kitchen upgrade
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. These add light right where you need it most. Perfect night/morning lighting as well as work light mid day. Kit came with everything. Will have these in every kitchen I ever have from now on Pics are 1: under cabinet LEDs only, at full power 2: under cabinet LEDs only, at lowest power 3: under cabinet LEDs off, normal kitchen lighting on 4: under cabinet LEDs at full power along with normal kitchen lighting on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What They Don’t Tell You
customer_reviews.text: What they don’t tell you is you are going to have to order a bunch of more parts if you want to install these. Unless you have a continuous row of cabinets, you need a separate converter and dimmer for each separate cabinet section. The “kit” comes with only one of each. I have 4 separate sections of cabinets meaning I had to order three extras to the tune of $45. What makes me mad is I would have ordered extras if this manufacturer had not concealed these facts to entrap me.
customer_reviews.author: greg wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent qualilty.  Easy installation.  Fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved to a new house. Mfg wanted $1100 for undercounter lighting. This system works great for around $50. I can't imagine an easier installation. The quality of the components exceeded my expectations. The color temperature is what I wanted (5000K). I used the double stick tape to mount the lights. Excellent collection of accessories. Small adhesive backed lead holder to dress the leads. I didn't need to use the extension cords. Refrig is to the left in the photo. Plugged the PS into the AC outlet used to power the refrig and then drilled a hole in the cabinet to route the PS lead to the switch. Installation took 30 minutes. Very happy with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. There was an over the sink light wired to a switch that I wired these too and then changed the switch to a motion detector switch(note: this switch "clicks" each time it is activated on or off, which isn't a big deal, but it isn't ideal). Had to buy the right angle drill attachment below to run the cable through the cabinet shelves. Also bought these just because of how my cabinets are all arranged. Looking for a solution to make the lights fade up instead of just snap on.
customer_reviews.author: Danferd

customer_reviews.title: Great lights long cable interconnect is a challenge
customer_reviews.text: I really like these lights. I've had them about a month. Most of the lights are installed. I bought the dimmer and connected the string to a wall switch it works great. But, there is a string on the other side of my sink I can not figure out how to connect them. I order the interconnect wire but it's a different connector size. Every few days I search looking for information about the connectors but that information is a bit confusing. Bottom line the lights are great, any long distance may be a challenge to connect. I did find an extension cable that works.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPurchases

customer_reviews.title: Great at first glance but...
customer_reviews.text: When I first open the package and tried them out, I loved them and immediately ordered another set however as I started to put these together I realize the bulky mess of cables these create. Too much cording. The power adapter is huge and heavy. I am afraid to hide it inside the cabinet as others had said it had melted or returned them due to fire hazard because how hot it gets. The heat could be felt inside the cabinet when hand is placed above that area. The LED’s and adapter are getting way too warm for LED’s. I am starting to lose confidence in these and I might be returning these and cancelling my new order.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Very great product! gives professional installation look ! highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent one! Very bright and adjustable, sit neatly and we have all we need to install, one recommendation to the seller it to add 12 ft connector so we can wire it over the other side of the cabinets (provided connectors are not sufficient) and one splitter along with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek and Sathya

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These lights flicker and there is no option for motion detection. Which is why I bought it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K Davis

customer_reviews.title: Do not last
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two 3 packs of these lights in July of 2018 for under cabinet lighting. They worked beautifully until last night. We have determined the AC/DC adapter on one the sets has crapped out, and the adapter Litever sells on Amazon is classed for Max Output 3A, 36W, which does not match the 2A, 24W AC/DC adapters that came with our sets. We certainly expected to get more than 1 1/2 years of use out of these lights. Warranty ended 1 year past purchase date, so we can't sent them back for replacements. Buyer Beware, you'll be installing new lights in less than 2 years. Back to fluorescents we go..
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 boxes these back in May and just now getting around to install them. Only 3 of the lights are working out of twelve. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: chuckelss

customer_reviews.title: DO NO BUY - These lights do not last.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: These things are garbage and the manufacturer does not respond. The flickering is constant now and I had to remove them and throw away. I purchased and installed these under cabinet lights about a year ago and they worked fine for about 8 months or so, then they began flickering. I checked all of the connections and everything is solid, but they still flicker from time to time. I reached out directly to the manufacturer via email and received no response. Probably best to look for a different brand and stay away from these
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Nice accent lighting.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE April 15th 2018 The rotary dial switch just crapped out, making the system inoperable. Nope, I won't buy it again. ********************* I used this light system under a kitchen counter and over a mirror on the counter at a little lake shack. Installation was super easy and fast... They give off more light than I expected. The dimmer switch is made out of cheap plastic an feels a little jinky when rotating the dial, so time will tell how it will hold up. Not bad for the price though. I'd order it again...
customer_reviews.author: Mick SunDog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lights, well-packaged.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the three- pack, 3000K set to replace some old halogen quartz pick lamps. These leds are excellent! High quality brand- name double stick tape is included in the box, so installation is really only a matter of deciding on a layout for your lights. My only complaints are that the provided cords are only about 4 feet long (I really could have used a 6-footer in my kitchen) and the dimmer emits a very audible, high-pitched squeal when it's on.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Performance Failure after 2+ years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product in November of 2017. Easy installation. Installed the dimmer as directed. Provides very nice under cabinet lighting in our kitchen. Based on initial experience I had recommended this product to friends. In February of 2020 something appears to have failed in the LED driver resulting in all six LED lights blinking simultaneously at about once per second. This is with the dimmer set fully off (Brightess light setting). Removing the dimmer from the circuit does not change or affect the problem. Setting the dimmer at about 50% on allows the lights to perform as normal but at 50% brightness. Was expecting longer life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights work great but...
customer_reviews.text: They don't tell you a few things that I think are important. They don't tell you that the power transformer is HUGE, not all ALL like pictured. They also don't tell you that if you order the 6 lights, it only comes with ONE transformer, so you can't really use it if the cabinets are separated by something like a sink. If they had specified, I would have purchased two separate sets. The deal breaker for me was the size of the transformer. I've had 2 sets of led touch lights that I've used for years, and the power source wasn't nearly this large. I sent them back and ordered the brand I've had for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amber MoralesTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Well made, well thought out product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is just superb, in every way. I bought two six-packs and two three-packs. The light bars are extremely bright. The light is uniform across the entire bar. They shipped a complimentary rocker-switch in addition to the dimmer switch. I used the screw-in clips for the lamps, and the glue-tape for mounting the transformer and rocker-stitch under the cabinet. It sticks very well. They also include enough hardware to keep the cables tucked away out of sight. The DC cable connectors are a standard size. A very well thought-out product. I'm already contemplating getting more of these for my study, the sitting room built-ins, and more. Once you start with this, you want to keep going...
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great and it DOES include everything you will need- dont buy extra extensions or connections
customer_reviews.text: I had to go under the microwave (over the stove) across and then had to go across a window over the sink and I thought I would never have enough wire, but I did !!! More clamps, screws, ties, etc. than you will use!!!! BRIGHT too! I got the white light led. The review here had a section to rate the motion sensor, Im not sure this has one? Great buy, GREAT price. Looks amazing, pics are on the phone or I would include them, , maybe later. Dont hesitate you wont come anywhere near close to match the price or quality at lowes or home depot.
customer_reviews.author: Truth and nothing but ...

customer_reviews.title: Nice but has a noticeable turn-on delay
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the light output and the amount of accessories that this comes with. I was able to mix and match to get exactly what I wanted. The dimmer was key for me since I wasn't sure how bright I wanted and it was easier to get something brighter than I likely needed and then dim down to what was good. The main downside is the ~0.75sec lag when you turn it on. I hooked up a set to a light switch and the delay is so bad it causes people to flip the switch on/off thinking it's not working. No complaints for the lights I have on a timer and thus lag isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Seems more like 4k temp than 3k temp. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Got the warm lights. It's a little whiter than we're used to but looks great anyways. I was worried that I'd have to screw them in but they're super light so I should be fine just 3m taping them. Hid the wires with white duct tape. Finished installing in about 20 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Chanh55

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Installed two weeks ago with dimmer switch. Everything worked well until yesterday; the lights started flickering and when I tapped the transformer they started to work again.. I am concerned about the reliability Look nice and well made but they must work! Started flickering again - hit the power supply with a hammer and it has worked ever since! Update: Litelife has been extremely responsive and have sent me a new power supply. Very satisfied with customer service. It now gets a four star. Have been installed for seevral months and they are working fine. Now gets a five star - for value and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Comments

customer_reviews.title: These lights broke after less than 4 months use
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous reviews on under cabinet lighting, I selected these as they were highly rated. I don’t know, maybe I got a bad batch. They were easy to install and worked great with a dimmer switch for exactly 4 months. Today, (as has been the story for the last month) they will only turn on to the lowest dim. Very very very sad and disappointing. I tried replacing the dimmer switch with the on-off plug in and the lights still barely illuminate. I am SO dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AC-DC adapter just took a dump!
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine until today, 11/24/2019. The AC-DC adapter just took a dump. Luckily, I had another one from another system and all the lights work now. I would appreciate the seller (Amazon) sending me a new AC-DC adapter and we will call it even.
customer_reviews.author: dolamiti

customer_reviews.title: Updated review - great customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE I WAS CONTACTED BY THE SELLER AND THEY PROVIDED AN EXPRESS REPLACEMENT. TY *WARNING* Ordered 3x sets...they all worked...initially. After 3 weeks, one started to act up occasionally which required me unplugging then plugging back in. Last Sunday (day 32, receipt attached) that set stopped working altogether. I tried switching power cords, switching receptacles, switching outlets, still nothing. I tried to “replace or return items” but those options were no longer avail due to being 2 DAYS PAST THE 30 DAY WARRANTY. VERY FRUSTRATING considering the product only lasted 32 days even with the ‘amazon choice’ designation
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: These kits are really good. Just installed it and the quality of light ...
customer_reviews.text: These kits are really good. Just installed it and the quality of light is great. Can't say how long it will all last, so I'll update the review if there are any issues in the future. The only problem is the DIMMER. It's NOISY. Especially when dimmed, it makes a high pitch noise from the build it coil, that I'm sure will bother those who have great hearing. Without the dimmer, the lights are great and actually are a bit TOO bright! :)
customer_reviews.author: Circles

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE LIGHTS
customer_reviews.text: This was a no brainer and very easy to set up. In hindsight I would have ordered smaller cables for some of my runs but that's just me. Everyone loves the way they look and enhance my somewhat small kitchen. I am now reminded that I really need new counters! It took 3.5 hours including drilling and OCD light placement, cable runs and hardwiring to J Box
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, very bright for being so small
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to provide some extra lighting over my work bench. They come with 3 different mounting options, I used the 2-sided tape and the lights were installed in less then 15 minutes, which included running and hiding the power cord. One of the nicest things about these lights is the come with both a dimmer switch and a simple on/off switch; I installed the dimmer switch which works great. For under cabinet/over or under shelf/over workspace/desk lighting these are an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and very bright
customer_reviews.text: I use these to light up my computer desk area so I can sort through the clutter. I attached them to my TV frame using the adhesive strips and routed the wires along the back without any hassle. The on/off switch and dimmer switch are good quality. At max setting, these are very very bright and just the 3 lit up half of a room - at the lowest setting, they are comfortable and helpful for seeing in the dark. The only concern was trying to hide the lengthy cords but the included cord clips and a little tape worked well.
customer_reviews.author: William Goss

customer_reviews.title: A very complete kit, but...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that the box contained literally every single fastener, device, etc., that I needed to install this in my apartment! Good LED output (power), dimmer is smooth and will dim down very low... quite happy with it! Usually corners are cut with the power supply quality - I'd be interested in seeing a teardown of it as it gets quite hot when the lights are at full brightness, but that's not unusual for any power supply. Almost made two years - now they flicker at all dimmer levels. Luckily I had an existing 12VDC power supply with the same barrel connector (mine is .75A vs the .3A provided) and it works fine!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Installed myself. Used on a kitchen cabinet . Plug in right by the cabinets. The only thing I didn't like was all the lead wire to the first light. Between the plug in wire that attaches to the on off switch wire which attaches to the transformer, there is way too much wire to try to hide. Would be better if you had add ons if you need more length. From the cabinet to the counter plug, I needed about 18 inches of wire. There must be about 6' of wires that need to be bunched up and is impossible to hide. Otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: kcclyde

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The lights are well made, but have several shortcomings. 1. Installation instructions are not adequate. ( what are the red sticky pieces for?) 2. Lights are not as bright as I wanted. For a desk you need to order the bigger set. 3 lights on full is inadequate 3. The switch is a rotating dimmer. Which I have to turn several time every time I turn on to get maximum brightness. 4. Switch is not made to be firmly attached to anything. It is impossible to screw3it to anything. I am not sure what they expect users to do, but I do not want a dimmer switch and two wires cluttering up my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Bensage1

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son and his wife put these in their kitchen under cabinets for night lighting. They have had them two years. I purchased for my kitchen because they look nice. I love them and recommend. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Versatile Product
customer_reviews.text: I had a number of uses for some "accent" lighting so I purchased 4 of these packages plus some Door Open Switches and two extra power supplies. I installed 4 lights in our antique bar, two in one closet, one in another closet, one by the laundry tub in my workshop, 3 as accent lights in my office and one inside my 3D printer. The installation was easy, the product components fit together without a problem, and all did what I had expected. I have some leftover components but that's fine. The kits are very complete. I'd highly recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our kitchen and I couldn't be more pleased! The kit comes with everything I needed, including wire clips for inside and under the cabinets. The only thing lacking was a remote. I was able to use one from a previous kit I had at this link:  and it works perfectly. I have multiple, disconnected cabinets so I had to string them together from a single outlet using multiple extension cables and I would highly recommend these lights and the kit. I also had to purchase the 6" version to get under smaller cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: DWY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I researched and debated over so many brands of under cabinet lighting before settling on these. I figured if they stunk, we could use them in our garage. This set is GREAT! It was super easy to install and the color of the light has just the correct amount of warmth without being too yellow. For a similar package, I was quoted about 5X the price at a local lighting store, so these are an exceptional value. There is no buzzing when they are dimmed and the mounting tapes and cable ties hold REALLY well. I will be ordering additional pieces for our garage workbench and dark closets.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Overrated brightness
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is me, but I like a lot of light where I work and these light do not come very close to providing that. I doubled them up and have them end to end and even then and at full power, it is not what I would consider a good working light. If you need this as an accent light, then it will work fine. I hope the dimmer will work longer than some reviewers have experienced....
customer_reviews.author: Danwood

customer_reviews.title: Installation was straightforward and easy. The power cord and dimmer provided plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this product. It was delivered as stated. Extremely well packaged. The product came with multiple installation accessories, each were of high quality. The interconnect cables were more than sufficient for my application. Installation was straightforward and easy. The power cord and dimmer provided plenty of length to support installation that may be more than just a couple of feet from an electrical supply. I used the double sided 3m adhesive strips for my installation and they worked excellent and sufficient quantity was provided. I shopped around and selected this based off reviews and product description and price. This was very well priced based on my search results. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E.

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, plug-n-play, can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with having enough cable since our kitchen counter are is pretty long. Thankfully the kit comes with plenty of cable and hardware (adhesive) to install how you please. It came with a standard on/off switch and a dimmable one, plenty of zip style ties, adhesive ties, double sided adhesive, everything you need to hide the wiring and lights. The are low profile so nothing can be seen unless your looking directly under the cabinets. I was pleasantly surprised at how bright they are and just how much nicer it makes the kitchen look for such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: sal kille

customer_reviews.title: Nice Under Cabinet Lighting
customer_reviews.text: The package came with everything described. Was easy to install the brackets to hold the light up. The sticky wire clips are holding up the wires. They also give double stick tape to hold up the power brick. Make sure to have a clean surface to stick it to if you are putting it under the cabinet and use enough tape to hold it. This package only comes with one AC power cord to plug into an outlet. If you are hard wiring to the house wiring you will need to cut off the plug. The larger set of lights comes with two AC cords one with a plug and one without.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, inexpensive videoconference lighting
customer_reviews.text: On Zoom and Teams meetings, I looked pretty washed out with a window behind me and to the side. Using the included adhesive strips, I placed light bars around the edges of my monitor -- and WOW what a difference. It's perfectly ample light, of a good color, and it's inobtrusive & out of the way. The only caveat: the dimmer that comes with this is a cheap PWM one which will make the lighting flicker on camera. Just use the included straight on/off switch and everything will look good. Besides, you really need all the light you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Good lighting kit
customer_reviews.text: I used this to install lights into an Ikea cabinet to light up my collection of ceramic crap. If I had one critique it would be the connectors between the lights could have been a few inches longer, but every install will be unique so how do they know. But good set to work with and has been reliable so far (this review is about 2 months after install and the cabinet is not lit up every day). I installed the dimmer switch on top of the cabinet at one corner so I can adjust how brightly it is lit up. These lights are cooler than some round puck LEDs I had for other cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Sixfourtwofifty

customer_reviews.title: Gets very hot (127 degrees)
customer_reviews.text: Although the LED lights were bright and uniform, be warned that the back of the light gets very warm. After 15 min, I measured 127 degrees and it was too hot to touch. I returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: csrow

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. Was weary of ordering these online without seeing the actual light output. Incredibly easy to install. Very low profile. When turned all the way up, they can light the kitchen by themselves. Turned down they make very nice accent lighting. Would definitely recommend these to friends and buy them again if needed. Planned on just using them every once in a while for accent lighting. After a few weeks, I’m finding we use them every night for accent and task lighting.
customer_reviews.author: RWU

customer_reviews.title: great value. warm diffuse and bright light.
customer_reviews.text: i'm reserving final judgement for after install.... so far. great price. lights are bright but not cold. totally bright enough for under counter. i'm a stickler for lights being electrically and acoustically quiet. can't speak for the electrical part yet but acoustically they are super quiet. note: i did not test with dimmer. speaking of dimmer, i love that they kept this piece modular. i don't want a dimmer and with this kit i don't have to use it! great. cover on lights allows for LEDs to diffuse nicely. no harshness. bars are low profile. check specs.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Porro

customer_reviews.title: Longevity is an issue. They were supposed to last years. Not a little over one year
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last year in March 2018. Already have had one of them burn out. Flashes like a flash bulb. Bought these figuring they would outlast normal lights. Lasted a year and five months. Disappointed! The other lights 8 lights are working. Now I have to either buy more of these, or start all over with better lights. 2 more have burned out. Little over a year old. Don’t last like they are touted.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Greatest light ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new lights! Installation was pretty simple -- I'm a short woman and working under cabinet is always difficult for me, but they were really simple to figure out. Great clips for holding the lights. The illumination is terrific. I love that they are 5000K -- super white, super bright. Love the dimmer feature. Love the extra parts -- needed some, didn't need some. Great adhesion on the little hooks. Did have to find screw-in cord cleats for the transformer -- too heavy for the hooks provided. Appreciated that I could purchase different pieces in different orders. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Shrimper

customer_reviews.title: Great clean lights for safe kitchen work
customer_reviews.text: Great under cabinet lights for working. I installed in my kitchen and it makes a world of difference. Great light temperature and output, install was easy but make sure you thoroughly clean and dry the areas beforehand. Note, I needed to have some extra two sided foam tape on hand for the large power inverter but it has been stuck up under the cabinets as well out of sight. Next hack to make these even better is to add them to the switched lighting circuit nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: brighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: A good set of lights. Easy to install. Comes with all the parts for a variety of installation approaches. The 3000K brightness is very bright for undercounted kitchen lighting. On the Amazon listing it is listed as "warm white" but the product description in the order is "super white" (better description). I would like a warmer color for the kitchen. These lights would be ideal for work surfaces such as workbenches or garages. Dimmer works well but makes a slight buzzing sound (not very loud) except at this full setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way they look after they were installed. It took about 15 minutes to install and tuck the cables up out of the way. Then I decided to go back and order a few more light elements to light some cabinets I had not planned on lighting at first. The company sells both a set of 2 elements and a set of 3 elements, so look for how many you need. Be warned that the set of 2 elements does not include any more of the little black cable clips used to tie the cables out of sight, so save a few if you want to buy that kit. This product has nothing do with motion detection.
customer_reviews.author: Sparx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting for Pantry.
customer_reviews.text: I installed a set of these lights in a small under-stair pantry. They were perfect! They were extremely easy to install and the brightness is perfect. They are very slim and took up very little room. I have a electrical plug-in receptacle in my pantry so these just plugged in and worked right out of the box. I had purchased another cheaper brand of LED strip lights and returned them - these lights are 10 times better. The ONLY issue I had is wire management. The wires are much longer than I needed so they had to be folded back and then twist tied to be held in place.
customer_reviews.author: Randy V.

customer_reviews.title: For the price, these can't be beaten
customer_reviews.text: I have installed under cabinet lighting in my garage and in our laundry room using similar kits that cost about 3x as much. This kit, for the price is just as easy to install/work with and looks just as good as the more costly kits. In installed the whole set (3x6 pieces) above and below our cabinets in about 3 hours with just double stick tape and a 5/8" spade drill bit with a small vacuum. The kit came with everything I needed to do a rather large kitchen. Totally recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Jammiman

customer_reviews.title: Great and very easy to install, slight lag on turning on.
customer_reviews.text: The package came with everything I needed to install. Very easy to hook together to create a awesome under the cabinet light system. My only complaint which is why it doesn't get a 5 star rating is the slight lag to turn on. I tried different outlets and tested the power on the outlet that's currently on the switch and it ran a lag every time and tested the correct wattage. Minus the slight lag on turn on it's perfect but I can live with it. The dimmer was a great addition and I placed it after my over the drain lights so I can dim the cabinet lights when I want a lower light tone.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product, and plug and play!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, everything you need to install it except a cordless drill. It's all plug and play. If you want to install it on two separate cabinets than you might want to also order an extension cable that is available in the same color as the kit. I ordered a 10 foot white one so it would blend in with my window moulding color. I also replaced the toggle switches with smart switches so with one click on my phone or Alexa and all the lights on both sides of the kitchen (above and below the cabinets) come on at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Customer Service!! Stellar Product! 5-Stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot praise this seller more highly! My first order had a couple of defective light bars that would not power on. After contacting the seller, they provided a couple of troubleshooting steps in an attempt to provide immediate resolution, and when that was unsuccessful they promptly sent out replacement units to get me up and running. The lights themselves go up very quickly, are sturdy and well made, shine brightly, and work very well with a wifi plug linked to Alexa - "Alexa, turn off the kitchen lights!"
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my closet.
customer_reviews.text: I had a closet that needed lighting. I installed an outlet to the switch and started installing the lights. Everything comes with the kit as advertised with easy instructions. I used all 6 lights in series. Four across the top of the closet ceiling that gives a great even light across the whole top of the closet (12’ long) and two under the bottom shelf that do great for lighting the shirts. I install the dimmer but really didn’t need it since I have it set on the brightest anyway. I would recommend these for anyone looking for a quick and easy lighting solution.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kurian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install; Looks great; one caveat
customer_reviews.text: These work really well with one exception - they have to be daisy chained. Alot of modern kitchens have separate cabinet areas and with these, you'll need a separate power source/controller and basically have two seperate installs. For cabinets that are close together however, these work perfectly and are easy to install with all of the supplied materials for installation. They look really nice and get really bright, and have a supplied dimmer so that you can set brightness to your preference.
customer_reviews.author: Wood

customer_reviews.title: LED Lighting
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second set of these 3-connected strips of LED undercabinet (or whatever) lighting. First set was under cabinet above kitchen counter. With its dimmer switch, great range from low mood utility lighting to very bright dependable source that lights up the whole kitchen. Second set is used for under-shelf pantry lighting that turns a gloomy walk-in storage closet into a brightly lit useful pantry where you can easily find what you need. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BRSON

customer_reviews.title: The Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: Seller was very fast at responding to my upfront questions. I purchased the warm white sets and I cannot express how simple the installation was. The kit is very well thought out and complete with plenty of adhesive wire holders to hide everything well, the only thing exposed is the plug. I installed my kits in the middle of the cabinets which adequately light up both backsplash and the countertop. Quite bright on the highest setting and very elegant on the middle setting.
customer_reviews.author: SuperGlide

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Under Cabinet Kitchen Light!
customer_reviews.text: The light from these is absolutely perfect. It is a very nice comfortable color perfect for under cabinet lighting. I'm happily replacing all of my halogen lighting with these. The amount of installation hardware is way more than needed, but very appreciated. The dimmer switch makes it so that I can adjust the brightness to what is optimal for my kitchen. These are bright enough to light my kitchen by themselves. We turn on the "main" overhead kitchen lights only while cooking. Otherwise, we just leave these on all night because they use low energy and give our kitchen a "romantic" feel.
customer_reviews.author: Adem Miller

customer_reviews.title: Brightens up the place!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! We got the warm white. My kitchen always felt so dark, these were easy to install and add so much light. We have a cabinet to the right of the stove and the rest to the left. I bought a splitter to plug in the outlet that is above the stove (used for the microwave) and drilled holes into each top the cabinets to run the wires in and then another hole and the inside bottom of the cabinet to run the wire out and connect to the lights. Super easy, wires are hidden and I couldn’t be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jessiemay

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and worked great for a while
customer_reviews.text: Then started flickering and haven't used since. Have tried to reach the seller with no success. I've reviewed other comments and have heard of the flickering issue but cannot get a response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised
customer_reviews.text: For the money I was a bit skeptical that I was purchasing a quality product, but the device, from installation, expansion, and functionality is really much better than expected. I ended up wiring these in hardwired and expanding across the kitchen. It's been over three months now and they're really nice even light. Purchased another set because of the cost just in case one ever goes out.
customer_reviews.author: aj price

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT addition to my kitchen. We have black cabinets and not alot of lighting and I've been wanting to add under cabinet lights since our old house was built with it. I did the installation myself and it took me about and hour but was easy and well worth it! I love the on/off switch it comes with as well! Very nice lights. If you use the stickers instead of screws, you will need stronger tape. I used the screws instead cause I don't plan on taking them down.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Bright, reasonably inexpensive, easy-to-install under cabinets (or small spaces) lights
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, easy to install under-cabinet LED lights. It's also thin enough to disappear under your cabinets and not be an eyesore, even if they would look nice if they were showing. We installed them in our newly-renovated kitchen and love the amount of light it provides (in our case, we choose a daylight tone, which compensates for a not-so-well naturally illuminated ambient). We're not using dimmers, even though it comes with one. It's so good I decided to buy an extra set to install in my living room bar, which sits in a darker corner of the room. Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: PMR

customer_reviews.title: Good substitute
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I have not used all the elements of the lighting kit as I only needed to replace the rheostat light control on a similar unit purchased a couple of years ago, but no longer in production. Luckily, the control fit my original lights, which have always worked wonderfully! This kit didn't have the remote the original kit had, but that was fine--it had way too many modes (strobe, auto dimming, various adjustments, etc.),when all I really wanted was to just turn the lights on and off!
customer_reviews.author: Arvid R. Murphey

customer_reviews.title: Great under cabinet lights with Ray install
customer_reviews.text: These lights are fantastic. I have a giant dim kitchen. I installed them under the cabinets on either side of the stove. I used the provided extension cords to go over/behind the microwave and it worked great. The adhesive on the lights and the cord clips works perfectly, I adhered them to unfinished wood in several places and had no problems. It came with a dimmer switch as well as an on/off switch. These work much better than the stick up click lights I tried first. I totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount, nice bright (but dimmable) lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights seemed high quality, were easy to link together, and came with a couple options for mounting. I did find the adhesive backing wasn't sufficient for my under cabinet install, so I just used the included screws and now they're staying put and will for a long time I'm sure. I was able to hide all the wires and use the outlet where the microwave plugs in to get to all my cabinet light locations. I also purchased the 2:1 splitter so I could get lights both below and above the cabinetry. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Lights making high pitched noise
customer_reviews.text: 2 months after I installed these lights the transformer has started to make a loud high pitch noise. Dimming the lights helps with the noise a little bit but it’s still loud enough to be annoying. Install was easy and straightforward. Lighting is good. Wish they didn’t make noise.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buy these and not the battery operated lights
customer_reviews.text: I just finished the install on these lights and they are awesome. I started to go with the battery operated and I am so glad that I didn't. A little more work on the install than battery operated lights, but I'm going to use them for years so I didn't mind. Still, done in 90 minutes. Now I never have to take them down to recharge or change batteries all the time! The manufacturer added extras like extensions, dimmer, on/off switch, extra screws, and variety of mounting choices. I bought the 5000K and love them. They transformed my kitchen. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I read ALLOT of reviews of LED light sets on Amazon before I bought this one. The 1’ long fixtures are neatly assembled from off the shelf components. The cables and barrel connectors are goid quality CATV cimponents. The 12v 2A power supply is made by a supplier that gets good reviews on Amazon for priducts sold under two-year warranties. The kit carries a two-year warranty and has a better price than other kits with two-year warranties. It is easy to split the 12 little 333 lumen fixtures into smaller sets and drive them with 12 VDC power supplies. We have a drawer fulll of 12V2A power supplies from buying external hard drive units used in pairs for back ups.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: we remodeled the kitchen and installed these. The light is fully adjustable and goes from dim for evening to fully bright for washing dishes. Best part is the box comes with absolutely every type of mounting hardware you could ever use for a variety of installations.. Will they last? I hope so, we love them so far.
customer_reviews.author: SteveDC

customer_reviews.title: Stop search and buy these. Can’t beat them.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the double sided tape was a joke so I used it to temporarily place them before I screwed them in. 18 months later and the tape is still holding. More importantly I’ve had these on 24/7 at about 40% without issue. Perfect warm color, thin and easy to hide. I don’t love the barrel connectors and ended up cutting them off in favor of solder/heat shrink as I ran everything through walls/attic to a permanent dimmer, but otherwise a flawless set of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet Lights
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying these, they are great bang for the buck! Super easy install, dimming, and I plugged mine into an Alexa outlet, so now voice controlled. I ordered an extra power supply to use the extra light bars in my garage. You can buy extra everything in addition to a kit, so figure out how many light bars/extensions you need before buying and get exactly what you need. Also, the color of the LED is a warm 3000K, which is perfect....unless you like the daylight white that makes you look like a ghost!
customer_reviews.author: Mobado

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Works with Smart Plugs.
customer_reviews.text: These light are great. Even lighting. Installs easy. The package has everything you could possibly need from extensions to cable management. Choose to plug in and control with on/off switch or dimmer. Or hardwire to a light switch. I ran the dimmer switch through the cabinet and into the space above the OTR that houses the power recepticle. Here I plugged it into a WiFi smart plug. There are no visible wires and I can control the lights power with Alexa or phone. After installing I purchased another set for my mother’s Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Workable & Dependable
customer_reviews.text: No batteries or recharging, and no sensor constantly turning the lights on and off, just electric supplied dependable light with a dimmer and on/off switch. I installed them under the kitchen cabinets over the sink and they work great (see 'before' & 'after' pic). The installation took a little time and patience first figuring out the placement of the lights and how to deal with the cords, etc. Oh and also, you will need double-sided sticking pads - the ones included with the packaging are one-sided only. For this, they lost a star, otherwise, I'm very happy with the result. It's l Iike a new kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Huge Kitchen Improvement
customer_reviews.text: This lighting is easy to install and makes a world of difference to my kitchen. It's also nice to be able to dim and leave on at night. Also has the ability to be very bright if desired. Looks great. The kit includes all the parts you might need plus extra. I was able to install under all my cabinets in my kitchen in about 30 minutes. No tools either. I actually ordered a second set after this first one, and installed lighting in the cabinets of a bar set. Would definitely order again for my next lighting project.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: This lights are excellent, plus they bring extra wires to extend something that I was worried about because there are gaps on my kitchen cabinets. The only reason that I am given 4 Star is because turning on the lights would have to happen near the cabinets. I will have to install a TP wife outlet and use Alexa for the lights that way don’t have to travell down the cabinets to turn on/off lights. Other than that little hassle they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Reyes-Pichardo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lights
customer_reviews.text: Love the warm white. I installed the dimmer switch and all 6 lights. Looks great. To do a good job you will need to drill holes to hide the wires. I would give it a five out of ten on the difficulty level if you install them so the wires don’t show. I used two sided gorilla tape instead of the cheep tape they sent so my light won’t fall down. (Available on amazon) It took me two hours start to finish ( including clean up) good luck and yes I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: timothy davis

customer_reviews.title: I bought the 6pack
customer_reviews.text: Bright lights with a very low profile. Separate dimmer on / off and an additional on / off switch. Your choice of the two switches. I use both in different areas of the cabinet. Direct current cord is included. I use the included adapter because I have a electrical socket above my stove inside a high cabinet. My wife is happy as the light gives our kitchen remodel a pop. Cheers. Update: If I live long enough to replace them I will get a brighter set.
customer_reviews.author: M RANKIN

customer_reviews.title: These are super easy to install and they work great
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need is included in the box and it's all modular so it's just plug and play. Yes, you have to do some drilling to run the wires and mount the adapter out of sight but other than that anyone can install these lights. They look great and they're very bright. Because I had two separate runs of lights I bought a wireless remote control and an extra plug.  You can also get a smart plug and use voice activation. A friend of mine did this and it also worked great. This is the one time when the product actually is as good as it claims to be.
customer_reviews.author: OkieBlue

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, dimmable, and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what I was missing. My 1929 kitchen cabinets and it’s 1950’s tile backsplash and countertop are illuminated, making my little kitchen feel bigger. Cooking is easier since I can see so well (I only had a single 24” task light over the sink previously). I was able to install them without my husband‘s help, which is quite a feat, since I have very limited use of my left thumb. I like them so much, I’m going to install them under the cabinets in the breakfast room. (The photos don’t do them justice, since they appear more garish than they actually are...) UPDATE: Installed in breakfast room. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Lela

customer_reviews.title: These are the best....
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these lights. They were easy to install and the 2700k looks great. I put a wall switched outlet in the top of my end cabinet that works great to turn them on and off. I mounted the transformer in the cabinet by the outlet. I mounted the included dimmer under the end cabinet. I routed the wires between cabinets under the front lip. I bought 2 10' extension cables with the same connectors to get up and over the overhead microwave and through the ceiling over the sink. It takes 1/2" holes to pass the connector through. Love these lights
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install, even with a built-in microwave dividing the kitchen in two. Had to drill some holes to hide the wiring but that was completely expected. I purchased a splitter when I ordered to accomplish this. Used same outlet as microwave above the range, so no counter receptacles utilized and wire is not visible at all. The range of light controlled by the dimmer was vast, I'd show a pic if I hadn't lost my cell phone!! I did not rate motion detection as I did not utilize this feature. I recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jeffdeeps

customer_reviews.title: Really great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Installed the under cabinet lighting tonight and am really happy with the result. Installation was really easy. Went with the double sided adhesive because the actually screw in clips looked like they'd be more hassle than they're worth. The main issue to work with is that you've got the big power adapter to deal with, but we hid it behind something else on the counter. Main concern will be the adhesive holding long term, but that's something easily dealt with by a trip to Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Lights are easy to “assemble” and the daylight lights are great. I love the dimmer. The instructions say it is not designed to be left on for extended periods but we never turn ours off (not suggesting anyone do the same) The only problem I have with the lights is partly my own fault. I am not a “handy person”. I tried to install under counter with adhesive strips included with the lights. They just didn’t hold that well. Will need to get someone handier to install above the microwave and drill holes as neede
customer_reviews.author: LostinSouthBama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Really Pleasantly surprised by the quality of all the components!! The kit was totally comprehensive and had everything needed with different options. The light is very bright but warm and the distribution/diffusion is great. I used the outlet in the cabinet used for the over-stove microwave and was able to completely hide all the wiring for a clean install. I paired it with a smart plug to toggle on and off with voice commands or a timer. I couldn’t be any happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Lights that actually work well
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. WARNING!!! The product comes with several extra components that can be used to help secure the lights and hide the wires. Take the time to plan out where they will go and how they connect to ensure that they look good. 1. I drilled a 1/2 inch hole between the cabinets to hide the wires. 2. I measured out all the bracket locations and attached the lights with "Blue" tape to ensure proper location. 3. I used a dab of silicon on the brackets to hold them in place as I screwed them in. NOTE: After the first purchase, I purchased another set and some additional components to install more lights under my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: ELKRAM

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These lights hit all of the important check marks for under counter lights: Bright - check, Dimmer - check, LED & low heat emission - check/check. Box comes with everything you need to go nuts installing these light. I ran a heat test and let them go at full brightness for a couple hours and was happy to see that their heat generation was very minimal considering the amount of light given off. Great buy and I will likely be adding some more here in the coming weeks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Easy install great light
customer_reviews.text: These lights were very easy to install. I used the clips that screw in which was very easy. The light covers a lot of area and is well distributed. My only comment is I would like to have seen a longer cord on each side of the light. You will need to order extra extensions if you need to get up and around a microwave or sink. With one kit and one package of 10 extensions, I covered 20 ft of counter space which is very well lit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of fixing options included.
customer_reviews.text: These connect together easily and as you would expect give great illumination. If you plug light to light, that is without the extension cord, you get a good coverage of light for use under the cabinets. Great variety of fixing options included. My only wish would be a switch/dimmer/power supply that could be inserted into a standard or double wall box albeit as an option. This would then make one slick installation without exposed wires from the power outlet to the underside of the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Don Law

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Lights for Garage Workbench
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice light kit. I used it for my new garage workbench and it came out looking great and was easy to install. Originally, I ordered the 3 light kit but then realized I had plenty of room for 6 lights under the upper cabinets and wanted more light. So I returned that kit and ordered this 6 light kit in 5000k. I'm more than happy with the outcome. The kit contained everything I needed to do a completely hidden install. It also came with a complimentary on/off switch which was great since it fit my needs perfectly since I didn't want/need the dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: August West

customer_reviews.title: Great for an arcade cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I used this light bar kit for a custom arcade cabinet marque. It is awesome. I like that the wiring is "plug and play" and dynamic. For instance, you don't have to use the dimmer if you don't want to. I would definately recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: thecrow32

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install. Great for DIY.
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive strips works fine. Not like flexible strip LEDs. Those had lousy adhesive. I had a LED Strip and it was harder to install and only lasted 20 months. Splicing was a nightmare. This has no splicing. It comes with everything you need. I chose to use the screw in brackets for all but one. I used the adhesive strips(3) to put one under the microwave and it has not fallen down. It has flexibility with short and long cords. Love the dimmer. It is brighter than the LED Strips. It was no problem adding on an extra fixture. You can add two if you want.
customer_reviews.author: JJChgo

customer_reviews.title: Designer look and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! They were so easy to install! Took me about an hour and a half from start to finish, and that was just me figuring it out as I went. Lots of different option it comes with for installation. You can tape them up, screw them in, secure wires, lots of adhesives it comes with that are very strong. WORTH EVERY PENNY! Gives it a designer looks for almost nothing. I have the daylight light look and they are so bright, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: KelseyMaton

customer_reviews.title: Complete kit and worked great for my cabinets
customer_reviews.text: The kit is complete for just about any type of configuration. I used the screw in clips, and drilled holes between the cabinets to help in hiding the wires. It comes with your choice of switches, one is on/off, and the other is off-dimmer-on. I would like it if they were a tad brighter, but they are ample for my poor lit kitchen counter areas. For the price of the kit, you can't go wrong! I will be hard wiring it using the extra wire they supply. I will be splicing an extension to be able to extend it around the kitchen window/sink area. Would highly recommend to anyone and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Greener

customer_reviews.title: Low cost light system for kitchen "over" counters
customer_reviews.text: I like that the lights don't display colors, I prefer white light for cooking and washing dishes. Colors are for parties and bright light is for cooking. These lights have dimmers so, you can adjust the brightness for the task. The cost is lower than other "over" counter lights. The connections are standard power plug and socket so, connection problems should not happen like with other "over" counter lights.
customer_reviews.author: Michael See

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely packaged
customer_reviews.text: Mostly as described, but I would not call the light ouput "warm". I find it rather on the blue side and cool. But the rest is as promised, beautifully packaged with everything you might need to install either by screwing clamps in, or by using double-stick tape (I did the tape... seemed much easier in an upside down under-counter situation). The dimmer works well, the light output is very bright if needed. Would recommend. Only might take off one star because I find the light too blue.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in New York

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit including everything you will require
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit to illuminate the inside of a china closet and the wife gave it a thumbs up!!! Everything you will need is included - led light strips, extension cables (for connecting strips not in close proximity), power supply, dimmer, on/off switch, double sided adhesive strips to attach the strips to a flat surface, screws and brackets to attach the strips (if you don't mind making screw holes), cable organizers with adhesive strips. This is an awesome product, each strip throws off quite a bit of light, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick installation
customer_reviews.text: Great under cabinet lighting. They are on almost all day to brighten my kitchen and the electrical box has never gotten hot. I have the set connected to a timer and they come on around 7 am and go off about 10:30 pm. Most of the day, I use the dimmer and have the lights at 50% brightness. When cooking, I can quickly turn the dimmer to 100% and can cook without ever needing my overhead lights.
customer_reviews.author: Gmafaye

customer_reviews.title: Really nice Light set
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this set of under counter LEDs. Everything you would need to install is included. The included dimmer is really a nice part of this set and allows you to adjust for the right amount of light. A hard wire plug is also included so you can direct wire to an existing power source if wanted. One thing we have noticed is that the first light in the set gets warm over a period of a few hours while the others remain cool. Not sure if this will be a problem but we will monitor it. Other than that, we are very pleased with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for reviews
customer_reviews.text: Moved to new house in new state, love house but dark kitchen. Tried the motion rechargeable lights, which were nice, but not enough. Not happy with dark kitchen, husband found these and after reading reviews well the rest is history, happy wife happy life lol love!!! You will not be disappointed! Highly recommend, oh and tip, you may have hidden outlet above microwave, a few drilled holes and you can not tell they are not already built in with house! Do not write reviews much but I should now more often .
customer_reviews.author: ljm

product_meta.title: Under Cabinet LED Lighting Kit Plug in,6 pcs 12 Inches Cabinet Light Strips, 2000 Lumen, Super Bright, for Kitchen Cabinets Counter, Closet, Shelf Lights, 31W, Warm White (6 Bars Kit)
feature_bullets: 【Super Bright】 ---31W bright warm white cabinet lighting kit. No LED dots. No light glaring.
【Easy to Install】---Sufficient self-adhesive pads, mounting clips, wire clips, extension cords will help you to install this under cabinet led lighting kit quickly and easily.
【Dimmable ONLY by included LED dimmer】---Rotary switch dimmer included for 0%~100% stepless dimming. NOT compatible with existing Wall Dimmers.
【Premium Quality】 ---Premium higher quality certified power supply included with US plug with 115CM cable. Licensed electricians can cut off the US plug and hardwire it to an ON/OFF switch.

specifications.Collection: 6 Pack Super Bright Kitchen Cabinet LED Lighting Kits
specifications.Included Components: Power Supply, Dimmer, Extension Cables, Mounting Clips, Screws, Self-adhesive pads
specifications.Special Features: Super bright, Easy installation, Hardwired, Plug and Play
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,751 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
